title: Bagels and Beans - Thomsonlaan
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain of lunchrooms. Offers vegetarian and vegan bagels plus sweets, coffee with soymilk option, fresh juices. The gluten-free bagel is not vegan. Uses some fair-trade and organic ingredients. Free Wi-Fi. Has a garden, a conservatory and a kid's corner.
